.. _glossary:

********
Glossary
********

.. glossary::
    :sorted:

    Documents REST Api
        Arango DB Http Interface for Documents.
        More details in `RestDocument <https://github.com/triAGENS/ArangoDB/wiki/RestDocument>`_

    Collections REST Api
        This is an introduction to ArangoDB's
        Http Interface for collections. `HttpCollection <https://github.com/triAGENS/ArangoDB/wiki/HttpCollection>`_

    Indexes REST Api
        ArangoDB's Http Interface for Indexes.
        `HttpIndex <https://github.com/triAGENS/ArangoDB/wiki/HttpIndex>`_

    Edges REST Api
        REST API for manipulate I trought HTTP interface of ArangoDB.
        Documentation about `RestEdge <https://github.com/triAGENS/ArangoDB/wiki/RestEdge>`_

    waitForSync
        This argument may be ``True`` or ``False``. If it's ``True``
        then you'll get response from the server when *Document*,
        *Edge* or *Collection* will be saved on disk.

    HTTP Interface for AQL Query Cursors
        *Description of HTTP Cursor REST API*
        on **ArangoDB** website:
        `HttpCursor` <http://www.arangodb.org/manuals/current/HttpCursor.html>`_
    Arango Query Language (AQL)
        `Querying documents and graphs in one database with AQL <http://www.arangodb.org/2013/01/31/querying-documents-and-graphs-in-one-database-with-aql-easily>`_
